alert.note: Alert for Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:26PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Meade County through 415 PM MDT... At 326 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Marcus, or 30 miles southwest of Faith, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plainview, Howes and Marcus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
